snippet: Oakland has lost five playoff series since 2000, and unless the Athletics sweep three games from Detroit starting Tuesday, they will fall again.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that Oakland Athletics, who have lost five playoff series since 2000, have fallen behind the Detroit Tigers, 0-2, and must sweep three games from Detroit to avoid another postseason failure.
lead_paragraph: Oakland has lost five playoff series since 2000, and unless the Athletics sweep three games from Detroit starting Tuesday, they will fall again.

headline.seo: Playoffs Have Not Been Kind to the A’s
headline.main: October Fortunes Seem Beyond Oakland’s Reach
headline.print_headline: October Fortunes Seem Beyond Oakland’s Reach
